means: 孟斐斯（古埃及城市，废墟在今开罗之南）

sentence.Network_en: The city of Memphis is promoting a populist approach to culture.
sentence.Network_cn: 孟菲斯市在推行文化的民粹主义道路。

sentence.Network_en: My uncle was the mayor of Memphis.
sentence.Network_cn: 我伯父是孟菲斯市市长。

sentence.Network_en: " I used to know a Bill Biloxi from Memphis, " I remarked.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 我从前也认识一个孟菲斯人叫比尔-毕洛克西. ” 我说.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...（一）孟菲斯（memphis）的工匠之神，也是世界的创造神-布塔。他是在世界还没发生之前就已经存在了，他创造世界的方式是经由他的思想和言语来创造的，他心里想的、嘴巴说的，世间的一切包括其它的神明都是由他所创造出来.

list.abs: from mozambique to those memphis nights ., 来自莫桑比克的夜音乐会.
the university of memphis institute of egyptian art and archaeology孟菲斯大学埃及艺术与考古系

means.word_mean: 1. largest city of Tennessee; located in southwestern Tennessee on bluffs overlooking the Mississippi River
2. an ancient city of Egypt on the Nile (south of Cairo)
